import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart-item', templateUrl: './cart-item.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart-item.component.scss'] }) export class CartItemComponent { @Input() showButton: any @Input() cartItem: any updateCartItem(num: number) { console.log("num:",num) } removeCartItem() { console.log("remove cart item") } }
